nodes.caption:
What can I say? Making fake cookies is just plain fun.

@oreo cookie printed for the awesome podcast @welcometotheaa by @andries8  and @alexagnewofficial 

Special thanks to @de_hond_van_jeroen_baert

#wttaa #prusai3mk3 #prusai3 #cookies #oreo

Nerdland logo printed on my Prusa i3mk3s+

Printed with PLA.

#prusai3 #prusai3mk3 #3dprinter #nerdland

Toying with my old #gameboycolor, I extracted my photo with an #arduino nano and some JavaScript from an #opensource project.

#gameboycamera #maker #arduinonano @arduino.cc

The way #pokemon was meant to be played, at 3 frames per minute and controlled by everyone at once.

I created a @discord bot where you can play #pokemonred just by using the reactions.

Check link in bio on how to add it to your own guild.

#discord #bot #github #typescript #emulator #gameboy  #discordbot

Why eat cookies when you can print them? This @oreo cookie is printed on three parts and contain magnets so you can twist them apart!

Maybe something for @lukaslelie
?

Filament: @prusament galaxy black PETG and Jupiter white PLA

#prusai3 #prusai3mk3 #3dprinter

Easy, but fun gift to make with your #3dprinter .

Made with #openscad with the "I love glitter" font

@stubru asked my to build three new trophies for De Nieuwe Lichting again, so I stepped up my game and stress-tested my new @josefprusa I3-MK3S+ with a few KG of bronze filament.

Total printing time: 75 hours for three pieces

Special thanks to @yannic.freson
 And @thomilo44 

#denieuwelichting #prusa #3dprinting #3dprinted #maker

First print of my own design on my new  Prusa I3 MK3+ by @josefprusa 

@adskfusion360 #prusa #prusai3 #prusai3mk3 #pla #3dprinting #3dprinted

A beautiful F16 PCB designed by @wvangool 

#maker #pcb #solder #soldering #fablab

Doing bit of hardware prototyping for the #marblemachinex with @alexcncen 

#maker #marblemachine #arduino #lcd
Since THPS 1 + 2 wasn't released on the #nintendoswitch , I guess I'll have to settle for the #playstation1 emulator.

It's been a while since the beginning of the quarantine where I had the motivation the finish a project. But, baby steps, right? #maker #eink #esp32 

Can't wait to return to my Hackerspace #area3001

Bedankt @stubru dat ik de trofee van #DeNieuweLichting mocht bouwen!
 Gemaakt uit #mdf en #plexi met de #lasercutter

#lasercutting #maker #plexiglas
It's raining cookies! This one is #lasercut from #plexi . @oreo made for #@lukaslelie

Met @henk.rijckaert heb ik een Oreo gemaakt waarin de subscribers staan van @lukaslelie zijn #standaardkoekhandel . Instructable komt binnenkort online!

#lasercutting #fablab #oreo #maker #koekjebijdecola

#tiktak how it's made. Met een speciale lens werd het 3mm MDF radarwerk gefilmd om de blik van de kinderen vast te kunnen leggen wanneer ze door de opening van het huisje kijken.

#lasercutting #lasercut #fablab @ketnet_be @vrt.be #diy #maker

How it's made #tiktak . Decor uitgesneden uit 3mm MDF en 3mm doorzichtige, zwarte Plexi. Met de #lasercutter uiteraard !

#maker #bts #diy #lasercutting @vrt.be @ketnet_be @ketnetjunior

How it's made: #tiktak . Naast 3d-printers werd er ook veel gebruik gemaakt van de lasercutters van #fablab Leuven. Hier een timelapse van het graveren van de figuurtjes van de blokkentoren! #behindthescenes #lasercut #maker @vrt.be @ketnetjunior
To thank @maartenvangramberen and @kvannieuwkerke for their service for #vivelevelo my friend Francois Janssens made this 3MM laser cut bike
